alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 3:45AM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph this afternoon into tonight. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Lackawanna, Luzerne and Wyoming counties. In New York, Chenango, Cortland, Tompkins, Tioga and Broome counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow could produce snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour for a time this morning. The steady snow will taper off to snow showers with continued blowing snow by late this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
